Breakfast.name: Pankecakes
Breakfast.description:
Any day that begins with three pancakes drizzled in golden, delicious syrup is gearing up to be a pretty good one.
            Nutrition and allergen information do not include condiments.

Breakfast.name: Bacon Roll with Brown Sauce
Breakfast.description: It’s a classic – delicious bacon with a choice of ketchup or brown sauce, served on a soft, white roll.

Lunch.name: BBQ Bacon Stack
Lunch.description: Two succulent beef patties with a creamy BBQ sauce, Pepper Jack cheese, bacon, onion, tomato and lettuce served in a poppy and sesame topped bun.

Lunch.name: Big Mac®
Lunch.description: Two 100% beef patties, a slice of cheese, lettuce, onion and pickles. And the sauce. That unbeatable, tasty Big Mac® sauce. You know you want to.

Lunch.name: McChicken® Sandwich
Lunch.description: Crispy coated chicken with lettuce and our sandwich sauce, in a soft, sesame-topped bun. A true classic.

Shakes.description: Deliciously refreshing smoothie blended with ice.

Dinner.name: Chicken & chorizo ragu
Dinner.description: Serve this delicious chicken and chorizo ragu over rice or pasta as an easy midweek dinner for the family. You can freeze any leftovers for another day

Dinner.name: Pork chops & mustardy butter beans
Dinner.description: Serve up dinner for two with these easy pork chops, mustardy butter beans and spinach. It makes a great midweek meal and delivers three of your 5-a-day
